articles.author: Claudia Chiappa
articles.title: Global health chiefs urge EU to step up amid US funding cuts - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Significant foreign aid cuts threaten to undo decades of progress in global health.
articles.content:
The Global Fund says it has contributed to cutting the combined death rate from AIDS, TB and malaria by 61 percent over the past two decades, saving 65 million lives.

articles.title: So long, Gaia: Europe officially retires prolific star-mapping space telescope - Space.com
articles.description: "We will never forget Gaia, and Gaia will never forget us."
articles.content:
Europe's star-mapping Gaia space observatory has entered its final orbit, after gathering valuable cosmic data for more than a decade.
